TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SpotLight extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase
Public NotInheritable Class SpotLight Inherits PointLightBase
.class public auto ansi sealed SpotLight extends System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLightBase

Docs.summary: Light object that projects its effect in a cone-shaped area along a specified direction.

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight> is a kind of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>, since it has a position, range, and attenuation. However, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight> also allows you to control the direction, shape, and other properties of the cone of the light's effect.
Specify values for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A> (beyond which nothing is illuminated), and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> (within which everything is fully illuminated) to change the spotlighting effect.
Lighting between the outside of the inner cone and the outer cone falls off linearly.
![Spotlight diagram](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagram")
## Examples The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight> in a 3-D scene.
[!code-xaml[3DGallery_snip#SpotLightExampleInline1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_snip/CS/SpotLightExample.xaml#spotlightexampleinline1)]
The following code shows the entire sample.
[!code-xaml[3DGallery_snip#SpotLightExampleWholePage](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/3DGallery_snip/CS/SpotLightExample.xaml#spotlightexamplewholepage)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks The intensity of the 's illumination diminishes from full illumination to none in that angle of the light's projection between the and the .
